<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 11"
    pfs=""
>
[Axuma's Vigor](/Feats.aspx?ID=4162) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Stolen Fate</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #191: The Destiny War](/Sources.aspx?ID=199) pg. 71</row>

**Prerequisites**
Exposure to the Well of Axuma

</column>

---

Your vigor grants anyone using [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) checks to [Administer First Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=54) to you, or use any of the Treat actions on you, a +2 circumstance bonus to their check. During the [Long-Term Rest](/Actions.aspx?ID=521) activity, you heal at twice the normal rate.
name: Axuma's Vigor
prerequisite: Exposure to the Well of Axuma
